column5: Please take a look at the sticky posted by TonyB.  It would be great to see some GTA OFNrs there.  Hope you can make it!

Thanks Doug...working with the City of Oakville right now...they have recently closed the gate at the top of the hill so I am trying to get it opened for Saturday.  Otherwise, keep an eye out for a location change.  Sorry about the last minute change, but with the warm weather we have been having I didn't think they would be closing the park so soon...  Stay tuned! and I'll update the sticky if there are any changes.  I'm hoping they can accomodate the gate issue... Tony
And a bump biddy bump biddy bump bump bump.  Jes' makin' sure.
And you saw the entrance change Doug...rear parking area at the church as the Petro Can park gate is closed.
Thanks, Wayne,  I'll be heading  there shortly.
